con:testCase.name: Scenario 1
con:testCase.con:description: Employees are not expected to learn every single currency code. The test should return the full currency name for any currency code, this should be an input parameter.

con:testCase.name: Scenario 3
con:testCase.con:description: A couple will be travelling to US and they are keeping a close eye on the value of the dollar. They want to purchase 500 GBP, only if the amount of dollars is greater than 800 dollars. The test should throw an assertion exception if the amount returned is less than 800 dollars.

con:configuration.path: declare namespace xmlns='http://webservices.cloanto.com/currencyserver/' if (//xmlns:ConvertToNumResult[1]/text() > 800.00) then 'Time to buy' else 'Dont buy'

con:testCase.name: Scenario 4
con:testCase.con:description: The company has a list of concurrencies that they deal with. Create a properties file containing the first five currencies and use that file to drive a test that will check each currency appears in the response.
